posts.title: Fireflies1
posts.content: My fancies are fireflies, Specks of living light, twinkling in the dark.

posts.title: Fireflies2
posts.content: The voice of wayside pansies, that do not attract the careless glance, murmurs in these desultory lines.

posts.title: Fireflies3
posts.content: In the drowsy dark caves of the mind, dreams build their with fragments, dropped from day's caravan.
